dialogue.start: I got a real predicament on my hands. I got a contract I got to fulfill, but I'm running out of time to complete the order. The forest has scared my workers away and thus, left all their lumber out. I need you to go out there and collect the wood left out, and then just maybe I can meet my deadline.
dialogue.active: Hurry! If I don't get this order in, no one would want to contract me again.
dialogue.completed: Excellent! I should be able to fulfill my order on time. To show my gratitude, here's something for your troubles.
dialogue.delivered: Business is good thanks to you.
